name: i18next-locize-backend
description: i18next-locize-backend is a backend layer for i18next to use locize service which can be used in node.js, in the browser and for deno.

scripts.compile:esm: rm -rf esm && mkdir esm && BABEL_ENV=esm babel lib -d esm && cp lib/getFetch.cjs esm/getFetch.cjs && rm -f esm/getFetch.js && node -e "fs.writeFileSync('esm/getFetch.cjs', fs.readFileSync('esm/getFetch.cjs').toString().replace('/* eslint-disable no-var */\n', ''))"
scripts.compile:cjs: rm -rf cjs && mkdir cjs && BABEL_ENV=cjs babel lib -d cjs && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > cjs/package.json && cp lib/getFetch.cjs cjs/getFetch.js && node -e "fs.writeFileSync('cjs/getFetch.js', fs.readFileSync('cjs/getFetch.js').toString().replace('/* eslint-disable no-var */\n', ''))" && node -e "fs.writeFileSync('cjs/request.js', fs.readFileSync('cjs/request.js').toString().replace('getFetch.cjs', 'getFetch.js'))"
scripts.compile: npm run compile:esm && npm run compile:cjs
scripts.browser: browserify --ignore cross-fetch --standalone i18nextLocizeBackend cjs/index.js -o i18nextLocizeBackend.js && uglifyjs i18nextLocizeBackend.js --compress --mangle -o i18nextLocizeBackend.min.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run browser
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:fetch && npm run test:xmlhttpreq
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run build && git push

author: locize
